exceptions.tactic: apply ex_RInt_ext with (g:= fun y => opp (f (- y))) in H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b" on hypothesis of type "is_RInt f (- a) (- b) If".

original: intros f a b H. unfold ex_RInt in H. destruct H as [If H]. apply ex_RInt_ext with (g:= fun y => opp (f (- y))) in H. - apply ex_RInt_comp_opp in H. apply H. - intros x Hx. unfold opp. rewrite Ropp_involutive. reflexivity.
